Package game

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Behaviour
    A factory for creating actions.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Application
    The main class for the zombie apocalypse game.
    AttackAction
    Special Action for attacking other Actors.
    AttackBehaviour
    A class that generates an AttackAction if the current Actor is standing next to an Actor that they can attack.
    Corpse
    Corpse object that is created when a Human is killed by a Zombie
    CraftAction
    An action class that allow a human or player to craft a cast of zombie limb into a mace or club
    Crop
    Crop class that is used with SowAction, HarvestAction and FertilizeAction within FarmBehaviour to produce a Food object by the Farmer.
    Dirt
    A class that represents bare dirt.
    FarmBehaviour
    FarmBehaviour class that is a child class of Behaviour.
    Farmer
    Farmer class which is an extend of Human class which has FarmBehaviour.
    Fence
    An impenetrable barrier.
    FertilizeAction
    FertilizeAction which is an extend of Action which is used to Fertilize an unripe crop
    FollowBehaviour
    A class that figures out a MoveAction that will move the actor one step closer to a target Actor.
    Food
    The Food class that will be used along with HealAction
    HarvestAction
    The HarvestAction class that is an extend of Action class to be used within FarmBehaviour
    HealAction
    The HealAction class that is extended from Action class used to heal an injured Actor
    Human
    Class representing an ordinary human.
    HuntBehaviour
    Returns a MoveAction that will take the Actor closer to the nearest instance of a target class.
    Plank
    A primitive weapon.
    Player
    Class representing the Player.
    PortableItem
    Base class for any item that can be picked up and dropped.
    RandomGenerator  
    SowAction
    SowAction class that is used as an Action
    Tree
    A tree that starts as a sapling and grows into a large tree.
    WanderBehaviour
    Allows an Actor to wander around at random.
    Zombie
    A class to create a zombie in the game.
    ZombieActor
    Base class for Actors in the Zombie World
    ZombieAttackAction  
    ZombieClub
    A weapon made from cast off zombie's Hand
    ZombieHand  
    ZombieLeg  
    ZombieLimb
    A class to keep track the amount of legs and hand a zombie has left It is automatically initialized in every zombie object This class also contain method to cast off a zombie limb when damage is received and movement control for the zombie if a zombie has broken leg
    ZombieMace
    A weapon crafted from casted off zombie's leg
    ZombieMoveBehaviour
    Has an arrayList of Behaviour contain Hunt and Wander behaviour
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ZombieCapability
